content.raw:
~~I'm not sure where this comes from, but with a clean build it looks like the unit tests link against boost_system~~
Never mind, I was in the wrong directory.

```
./src/CMakeFiles/UNIT_ign_TEST.dir/link.txt:/usr/bin/c++    -ggdb3 -msse4.2 -msse4.1 -mssse3 -msse3 -mfpmath=sse -msse -msse2  -std=c++11
 -fvisibility=hidden -Waddress -Warray-bounds -Wcomment -Wformat -Wnonnull -Wparentheses -Wreorder -Wreturn-type -Wsequence-point -Wsign-
compare -Wstrict-aliasing -Wstrict-overflow=1 -Wswitch -Wtrigraphs -Wuninitialized -Wunused-function -Wunused-label -Wunused-value -Wunus
ed-variable -Wvolatile-register-var -Wextra -Wno-long-long -Wno-unused-value -Wno-unused-value -Wno-unused-value -Wno-unused-value -Wfloa
t-equal -Wshadow -Winit-self -Wswitch-default -Wmissing-include-dirs -pedantic -Wno-pragmas -Wc++11-compat  -ggdb3 -msse4.2 -msse4.1 -mss
se3 -msse3 -mfpmath=sse -msse -msse2     CMakeFiles/UNIT_ign_TEST.dir/ign_TEST.cc.o  -o UNIT_ign_TEST  -L/workspace/gzecs/build/sdformat/
src  -L/workspace/gzecs/build/sdformat/test  -L/workspace/gzecs/install/lib -rdynamic -Wl,-Bstatic -lgtest -lgtest_main -Wl,-Bdynamic lib
sdformat.so.6.0.0 -lpthread -ltinyxml /workspace/gzecs/install/lib/libignition-math4.so.4.2.0 -lboost_system -ltinyxml -Wl,-rpath,/worksp
ace/gzecs/build/sdformat/src:/workspace/gzecs/build/sdformat/test:/workspace/gzecs/install/lib
```

~~Maybe this doesn't matter though, I don't see the executable requiring any boost library~~

```
$ ldd src/UNIT_ign_TEST 
        linux-vdso.so.1 =>  (0x00007ffed95bf000)
        libpthread.so.0 => /lib/x86_64-linux-gnu/libpthread.so.0 (0x00007f9ce7dac000)
        libstdc++.so.6 => /usr/lib/x86_64-linux-gnu/libstdc++.so.6 (0x00007f9ce7a2a000)
        libgcc_s.so.1 => /lib/x86_64-linux-gnu/libgcc_s.so.1 (0x00007f9ce7814000)
        libc.so.6 => /lib/x86_64-linux-gnu/libc.so.6 (0x00007f9ce744a000)
        /lib64/ld-linux-x86-64.so.2 (0x00007f9ce7fc9000)
        libm.so.6 => /lib/x86_64-linux-gnu/libm.so.6 (0x00007f9ce7141000)
```
content.html:
I'm not sure where this comes from, but with a clean build it looks like the unit tests link against boost_system Never mind, I was in the wrong directory.

./src/CMakeFiles/UNIT_ign_TEST.dir/link.txt:/usr/bin/c++    -ggdb3 -msse4.2 -msse4.1 -mssse3 -msse3 -mfpmath=sse -msse -msse2  -std=c++11
 -fvisibility=hidden -Waddress -Warray-bounds -Wcomment -Wformat -Wnonnull -Wparentheses -Wreorder -Wreturn-type -Wsequence-point -Wsign-
compare -Wstrict-aliasing -Wstrict-overflow=1 -Wswitch -Wtrigraphs -Wuninitialized -Wunused-function -Wunused-label -Wunused-value -Wunus
ed-variable -Wvolatile-register-var -Wextra -Wno-long-long -Wno-unused-value -Wno-unused-value -Wno-unused-value -Wno-unused-value -Wfloa
t-equal -Wshadow -Winit-self -Wswitch-default -Wmissing-include-dirs -pedantic -Wno-pragmas -Wc++11-compat  -ggdb3 -msse4.2 -msse4.1 -mss
se3 -msse3 -mfpmath=sse -msse -msse2     CMakeFiles/UNIT_ign_TEST.dir/ign_TEST.cc.o  -o UNIT_ign_TEST  -L/workspace/gzecs/build/sdformat/
src  -L/workspace/gzecs/build/sdformat/test  -L/workspace/gzecs/install/lib -rdynamic -Wl,-Bstatic -lgtest -lgtest_main -Wl,-Bdynamic lib
sdformat.so.6.0.0 -lpthread -ltinyxml /workspace/gzecs/install/lib/libignition-math4.so.4.2.0 -lboost_system -ltinyxml -Wl,-rpath,/worksp
ace/gzecs/build/sdformat/src:/workspace/gzecs/build/sdformat/test:/workspace/gzecs/install/lib

Maybe this doesn't matter though, I don't see the executable requiring any boost library

$ ldd src/UNIT_ign_TEST 
        linux-vdso.so.1 =>  (0x00007ffed95bf000)
        libpthread.so.0 => /lib/x86_64-linux-gnu/libpthread.so.0 (0x00007f9ce7dac000)
        libstdc++.so.6 => /usr/lib/x86_64-linux-gnu/libstdc++.so.6 (0x00007f9ce7a2a000)
        libgcc_s.so.1 => /lib/x86_64-linux-gnu/libgcc_s.so.1 (0x00007f9ce7814000)
        libc.so.6 => /lib/x86_64-linux-gnu/libc.so.6 (0x00007f9ce744a000)
        /lib64/ld-linux-x86-64.so.2 (0x00007f9ce7fc9000)
        libm.so.6 => /lib/x86_64-linux-gnu/libm.so.6 (0x00007f9ce7141000)
